item.title: SKYHack 2018 Building for Disaster Relief
item.description: SKYHack 2018: Building for Disaster Relief This blog post details my experience in participating in SkyHack 2018, a hackathon by the Chhattisgarh Government to build applications for Android Phones going to be distributed as part of the Sanchar Kranti Yojana. The process of participation included selecting a social problem to solve from a set of 6 statements, submitted a proposal of our solution before 31st July 2018, Implementing a PoC of the solution and pitch our solutions at 36inc, Raipur.
